The baptizing of the eunuch in three sermons vpon Act. 8. 36. 37. 38. By Samuel Hieron. Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.
[4], 56 p.
Printed by Melch. Bradvvood for Samuel Macham, and are to be solde at his shop in Pauls church-yard at the signe of the Bull-head, London : 1613.
A sermon. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
